attributes.action: Make Parliament & the PM debate 2nd EU/Peoples vote in light of tabled EU Deal
attributes.additional_details:
Whether your support lies with Mrs May’s negotiated EU deal, or a No-Deal exit from the European Union, few can argue that neither approach will have the required level of support in the HoC.

Brexit itself is looking, on whatever level if the U.K. don’t retain a form of customs union with the EU, as a precursor to the Good Friday Agreement ending, after all the WTO don’t allow for soft borders, & Brexiteers won’t stomach any continuing EU union/ties.

Please add your signature to this petition.
attributes.background:
The 2016 vote saw a huge turnout on the subject of our future relationship with the EU, but was managed & campaigned for & against, under clouds of conjecture, false truths, spin & undeliverable promises

With more facts & realistic outcomes, plus analysis.. a 2nd, informed vote must be considered
